name: Mind Palace (balazsblesko)
description:
Mind Palace is the result of a project I worked on for the Level Design and Scripting module at Uni. The module was our introduction to Unreal.

It is a project inspired by my memories of a space in time - so, it is very personal but I am not afraid to share it.

It is a simple, very short 3D walking simulator with a bit of narrative. 

The following content were used in the making of Mind Palace:

Ancient Environment

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ancient-environment 

Abandoned Playground

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/abandoned-playground

Monsters (James Blunt) Piano Keyboard Tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1wwUo1wkRcs

Police Radio Chatter Sound Effect [Extended]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B47A4IVXsJk

Uematsu, N, (2000), Song of Memory [wav]
